category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_upload_asyncflow_enabled
preference.preference_description: Indicates if IMDS ItemRevision or its subtypes information can be asynchronously uploaded to IMDS.It also indicates that 'IMDS' tab is enabled on client invoking asynchronous upload request to IMDS The default value is "true". If no value is provided, or the preference does not exist , it would mean neither asynchronous upload nor 'IMDS' tab would be enabled on the invoking client.
